CustomField.description: Should return the Friday 10 weeks after the start date.
CustomField.formula: (Start_Date__c + 7*( Length__c )) + ( 5 - MOD( (Start_Date__c + 7*( Length__c )) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ) ) + IF( MOD( (Start_Date__c + 7*( Length__c )) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ) >= 5, 7, 0 )
CustomField.label: End Date
